thread.title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 4 Matte Black variant to go on sale via Flipkart and Mi.com starting at Rs 9,999
thread.title_full: Xiaomi Redmi Note 4 Matte Black variant to go on sale via Flipkart and Mi.com starting at Rs 9,999

title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 4 Matte Black variant to go on sale via Flipkart and Mi.com starting at Rs 9,999
text:
Home Android Phones Xiaomi Redmi Note 4 Matte Black variant to go on sale via... Xiaomi Redmi Note 4 Matte Black variant to go on sale via Flipkart and Mi.com starting at Rs 9,999 By - March 1, 2017 “The Redmi Note 4 is now available in dark grey, gold and black with matte finish in India” 
The Xiaomi Redmi Note 4 was launched in India in January this year in three hues – dark grey, gold and black with a matte finish. So far, the phone was only available in the dark grey and gold hues. Now the company has started selling the much-awaited matte black variant of the Redmi Note 4 via Flipkart and Mi.com . 
The Xiaomi Redmi Note 4 comes in three configurations including 2GB RAM / 32GB storage, 3GB RAM / 32GB storage, and 4GB RAM / 64GB storage, priced at Rs 9,999, Rs 10,999 and Rs 12,999 respectively. If you are interested in purchasing the phone, then do take a look at our review of the device first. Facebook Comments
